sections.text:
38-2053.Physician assistants; negligent acts; liability.

Any physician or physician groups utilizing physician assistants shall be liable for any negligent acts or omissions of physician assistants while acting under their supervision.

SourceLaws 1973, LB 101, § 14;R.S.Supp.,1973, § 85-179.17;Laws 1985, LB 132, § 13;R.S.1943, (2003), § 71-1,107.28;Laws 2007, LB463, § 711;Laws 2020, LB755, § 14.
